channel.title: I need help with shops
channel.description:
hey all there,
i was starting coding allstar-scape but when i tried to add shops it won't open them, idk why but this exception i get: [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/35i8ytu.jpg[/img]
this codes i added into my server:
i added this in case 155: // first click npc case: [code=java] } else if (NPCID == 923) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 72; ///[/code]
in shops.cfg i added this: shop = 72 ~[Exchangeable 1b Tokens]~ 2 2 4067 50
and in autospawn.cfg spawn = 923 3224 3221 0 3226 3225 3218 3221 1 shop.
does anyknow what i have done wrong, or forgotten?
thanks for reading!
[/code]
